hero.title: Modern Independent Houses for Rent in Sector 78 Gurugram
description: Sector 78 Gurugram is a fast-developing residential locality known for planned infrastructure, open surroundings, and smooth connectivity to major city routes. Tenants searching for a house for rent in Sector 78 Gurugram are attracted to the area because of its proximity to NH-48, Southern Peripheral Road (SPR), and easy access to Sohna Road and Manesar. The sector is surrounded by modern residential projects, daily convenience stores, schools, healthcare facilities, and green spaces, making it suitable for peaceful urban living.

Independent houses in Sector 78 offer comfortable layouts, better privacy, and a calm neighborhood environment compared to crowded city areas. The locality is ideal for families, working professionals, and tenants looking for a balanced lifestyle away from congestion while still being well-connected. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 78 Gurugram means enjoying planned development, improving social infrastructure, and long-term residential comfort.

faqs.question: Is Sector 78 Gurugram a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 78 is a planned and developing residential area with good connectivity and peaceful surroundings.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 78?
faqs.answer: Independent houses from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are commonly available.

faqs.question: Is Sector 78 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area is family-friendly with schools, healthcare facilities, and open spaces nearby.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available in Sector 78?
faqs.answer: Furnished and semi-furnished houses are available depending on owner preferences.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 78 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental values depend on plot size, condition, and location, offering mid-range to premium options.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 78?
faqs.answer: Sector 78 is well-connected via NH-48, SPR Road, and nearby major city routes.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 78?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families.

faqs.question: Is Sector 78 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is considered a safe and well-planned residential locality.
